CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper January 25, 1969, pg. 16, reads: "On Their Toes - Two of the professionals who performed in 'Nutcracker' seen here on their toes, are Mary Petrov, wife of Nicholas Petrov, choreographer for the Playhouse and Ural Wilson, former lead dancer with the Katherine Dunham Co. Both have danced in ballet companies in this country and abroad. Mrs. Petrov is a native of South Africa."
TitMainTitle: Dancers, man lifting woman, in Nutcracker performance, Pittsburgh Playhouse
